extensionDescription.message: Ajoute une barre pour afficher le statut de vos téléchargements

barClearButton.description: Text for the clear downloads button

tooltipReferrerNone.description: Text to show if there is no referrer

tooltipMimeUnknown.description: Message to show if the mime type is not known

tooltipClearDownload.description: Clear the download info on bar.

tooltipDeleteDownload.description: Clear the download info on bar and delete download file.

optionsDisplayPanelTitle.description: Title of the display options panel.

optionsTheme.description: Label for the base theme selection

themeLight.description: The name of the light theme

themeDark.description: The name of the dark theme

optionsCustomizeTheme.description: Caption for the add a new customize theme button

customizeThemePanelTitle.description: Title for the customize theme panel

customizeThemeName.description: Label for the customize theme name

customizeThemeDefaultName.description: Text for the customize theme default name

customizeThemeDeleteTheme.description: Caption for the delete this customize theme button

customizeThemeLabelBackground.description: Label for the dowmload bar's background

customizeThemeLabelBackgroundHover.description: Label for the dowmload bar's menu background when mouse hover

customizeThemeLabelButtonHover.description: Label for the button's background when mouse hover

customizeThemeLabelBorder.description: Label for the dowmload bar's border

customizeThemeLabelDownload.description: Label for the dowmload progress's background

customizeThemeLabelProgress.description: Label for the dowmload progress's foreground

customizeThemeLabelText.description: Label for the dowmload bar's text

customizeThemeLabelError.description: Label for progress's background when the dowmload has error

optionsAlwaysShowBar.message: Toujours afficher la barre de statut

optionsAutoHidePanelTitle.description: Title of the auto hiding options panel

optionsAutoHideOptional.message: Optionnel. Si rien n'est sélectionné, tous les types de fichiers seront automatiquement masqués.

optionsAutoHideSecondsInputBeforeText.description: The text before the seconds input field

optionsAutoHideSecondsInputAfterText.description: The text after the seconds input field

optionsSelectType.description: Label of the select file type dropdown

optionsSelectFileType.description: Placeholder for the select file type dropdown

optionsIgnoreFilesPanelTitle.description: Title of the auto hiding options panel

optionsIgnoreFilesDescription.message: Ces types de fichiers n'apparaîtront pas dans la barre

optionsMiscellaneousPanelTitle.description: Title of the miscellaneous options panel

optionsCompletionSoundTitle.description: Title of the completion sound section

optionsPlaySound.message: Joue un son quand un téléchargement est terminé

optionsCustomSoundNote.message: Optionnel : vous pouvez choisir un de vos fichiers sonores (1Mo MAX)
optionsCustomSoundNote.description: Message about choosing a custom sound

optionsCustomSoundPlaceholder.description: Placeholder of input, about choosing a sound

optionsRefreshRateTitle.description: Title of the refresh rate section

optionsRefreshRateNote.message: Contrôler la fréquence de rafraîchissement de la barre
optionsRefreshRateNote.description: Description of what the refresh rate does

optionsHistoryLabel.message: Effacer également l'historique de téléchargement du navigateur lors de l'effacement de la barre
optionsHistoryLabel.description: Label for the checkbox to enable browser history clearing

optionsClearFailedLabel.message: Le bouton Effacer efface également les téléchargement en échec
optionsClearFailedLabel.description: Label for the checkbox to enable clearing failed downloads with the clear button
